article.title: Lockheed Receives Digital-to-Analogue Conversion Contract
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Lockheed Martin Corporation, Moorestown, New Jersey, is being awarded a $7,377,392 cost-plus-fixed-fee contract for direct digital to high power analog conversion technology will enable the combining of digital to analog conversion and high-power amplification into a single component technology realizing revolutionary advantages.Â Air Force Research Laboratory, Wright-Patterson Air Force Base, Ohio, is the contracting activity.
